articles.author: MATTHEW LEE, BARAA ANWER, DASHA LITVINOVA
articles.title: Top Russian and US officials are discussing improving ties and ending the Ukraine war —without Kyiv - The Associated Press
articles.description: The top diplomats from Russia and the U.S. are meeting in Saudi Arabia to discuss improving ties and negotiating an end to the war in Ukraine. Tuesday's talks represented a rapid and major change in American foreign policy under President Donald Trump. No Ukr…
articles.content: RIYADH, Saudi Arabia (AP) The top diplomats from Russia and the U.S. met Tuesday in Saudi Arabia to discuss improving ties and negotiating an end to the war in Ukraine talks that represented a rapid … [+5903 chars]
